meico.xml

Class XmlBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • meico.xml.XmlBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractMsm, Mei, MusicXml, Svg

    public class XmlBase
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a primitive for all XML-based classes in meico.
    Author:
    Axel Berndt

      • writeFile

        public boolean writeFile()
        writes the data document to a file at this.file (it must be != null); if there is already a file with this name, it is replaces!
        Returns:
        true if success, false if an error occured

      • writeFile

        public boolean writeFile(java.lang.String filename)
        writes the document to a file (filename should include the path and the extension)
        Parameters:
        filename - the filename string; it should include the path and the extension
        Returns:
        true if success, false if an error occured

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        if the constructor was unable to load the file, the data is empty and no further operations
        Returns:
